layout.singingstanza: The fish need wa -- ter, The birds need air, The chil -- dren need home meet -- ings. The cows eat grass, The cars need gas, The chil -- dren need home meet -- ings.

lyrics.stanza: The fish need water, The birds need air, (clap clap clap) The children need home meetings. (repeat)
The cows eat grass, The cars need gas, (beep beep beep) The children need home meetings. (repeat)
I need you, And you need me, (clap clap clap) We're members of a family. (repeat)
And God needs us, And we need God, (clap clap clap) To be His testimony. (repeat)
